name: Scary Escape
description:
Welcome to the world of nightmares! Scary Escape is a place where all your worst dreams become real. You are trapped in your dreams and you’ll have to escape by overcoming your fears, finding clues and hidden objects, breaking the codes and solving tons of innovative puzzles. Fifteen rooms with the scariest dreams of yours are waiting for you. Escape your fears now!

Super scary atmosphere!
Innovative brain teasers!
Amazing graphics!
15 different nightmares!
Tricky puzzles
It's free!
...and much more!
